content:
What was a complete mess when you first arrived has transformed into a beautifully decorated fairgrounds. The main tent now stands tall, the many tables surrounding it decorated with colorful fabrics.

The paths leading to and from the tent are lined with rows of evenly spaced lambance rods, each glowing with a warm and inviting light. A sweet fragrance drifts through the air, and vibrant butterflies and hummingbirds flit about the grounds, along with more than a few cloudhive bees.

Festival Grounds enters play with 0 tasks on it.
